text: ::Mitrovica can also refer to Kosovska Mitrovica, a city in Kosovo Sremska Mitrovica is a city in the Vojvodina province of Serbia. Today, about 39.000 people live in the city, about 85.000 in its urban area. The city has a long history going back to the Romans. Many Roman emperors were born in or around the city. Category:Cities in Serbia
title: Sremska Mitrovica
